content:
Hi there, I'm trying to add a linkifier rule for my organization's Jira instance, but I can't get the URL format string to work. This is what I'm using:

https://intrepid-networks.atlassian.net/browse/%(id)

But Zulip is claiming this is an invalid URL Format string. Any ideas?

I think you need s at the end of the url. So https://intrepid-networks.atlassian.net/browse/%(id)s.
I do not know if that is the problem
I will give that a try, thanks!
